source: TEXT_HEAVNZ219_01788_SEQ_00<tab>Cibleroit stares longingly into the distance.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ219_01788_SEQ_00<tab>ヴァスの塚のシブルロアは、遠くを見ているようだ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ219_01788_SEQ_01<tab>Cibleroit has become enraptured with the thought of eating the meat of the nearby loaghtans. He asks you to cross the nearby river and hunt these loaghtans, collecting three flanks of their succulent meat.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ219_01788_SEQ_01<tab>シブルロアに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8ACD01 /var>の調達を頼まれた。高地ドラヴァニアのスモーキングウェイストにいる「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) F20DF301 /var>」を討伐して「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8ACD01 /var>」を3つ入手しよう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ219_01788_SEQ_02<tab>You slaughter the loaghtans like cattle. Return to Loth ast Vath with your haul.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ219_01788_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8ACD01 /var>を入手した。ヴァスの塚の「シブルロア」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8ACD01 /var>」を渡そう。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ219_01788_SEQ_03<tab>Cibleroit and the Hungerer both agree: the meat is exquisite. One advantage of being of the Nonmind is the right of individuals to decide for themselves what they will eat. In the Onemind, only members of the warrior caste have the privilege of eating meat.
target: TEXT_HEAVNZ219_01788_SEQ_03<tab>シブルロアに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8ACD01 /var>を渡した。<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E8ACD01 /var>は、シブルロアとウマソウの大好物だったようだ。「グナースの塚」にいるグナース族たちは、兵隊しか肉を食べることができず、自由に肉を食べることができるのは、「分かたれし者たち」の特権らしい。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ219_01788_TODO_00<tab>Kill loaghtans and obtain their meat.

TEXT_HEAVNZ219_01788_CIBLEROIT_000_000<tab>Hunter, we have another request to make of you. The loaghtans on the far side of the river─their meat is delicious. Please bring us some of their delicious meat. <click> <click>
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ219_01788_CIBLEROIT_000_000シシシシシ……狩人、またお前に頼みたい。
「」がほしいのだ……。
あれは、途方もなく美味いからな。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ219_01788_UMASOU_000_001<tab><click> <click> We overheard your conversation. The loaghtan's meat truly is delicious. But that you would try to keep it to yourself? We think it is not fair.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ219_01788_UMASOU_000_001……話は聞かせてもらったわ……シシシシシ。
確かに「」は、とてもウマいわね。
でも、独り占めはズルいというものよ？

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ219_01788_CIBLEROIT_000_002<tab>We were not talking to you, Hungerer. Do you so miss hearing the thoughts of others? But you are right. It is not fair. Very well. Hunter, please bring us three flanks of delicious loaghtan meat. <click> <click>
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ219_01788_CIBLEROIT_000_002目ざといな、ウマソウよ。
仕方あるまい、「」を3つ頼む。
「」なら南に進んだ平原にいるゆえな……シシシシシ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ219_01788_CIBLEROIT_000_010<tab>Please bring us three flanks of loaghtan meat. Our mandibles itch at the thought of it. <click> <click>
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ219_01788_CIBLEROIT_000_010仕方あるまい、「」を3つ頼む。
「」なら南に進んだ平原にいるゆえな……シシシシシ。

TEXT_HEAVNZ219_01788_CIBLEROIT_000_020仕方あるまい、「」を3つ頼む。
「」なら南に進んだ平原にいるゆえな……シシシシシ。

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ219_01788_CIBLEROIT_000_021<tab>Yes. This is it. This meat is very good. You have brought us very good meat. <click> <click> I cannot wait to eat it.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ219_01788_CIBLEROIT_000_021シシシシシ……間違いない、「」だ。
それも、脂ののりきった上質な肉……さすがは腕利きの狩人だ。
食べる前から、気持ちがたかぶるというものよな！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ219_01788_UMASOU_000_022<tab>Yes. The smell of this meat is very good. We do not remember the last time we saw such fresh, juicy meat.
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ219_01788_UMASOU_000_022……その言葉には共感を覚えるわ……シシシシシ。
したたる血の香りといい、こんなウマソウな生肉は久しぶり。
嗚呼、私の自慢の唾液が、とめどなく湧き出してくるわ！

source: TEXT_HEAVNZ219_01788_CIBLEROIT_000_022<tab>In the Onemind, only warriors are fed meat. But for ones such as us, to be able to eat meat─and whenever the mood takes us... <click> <click> <click> There are very real advantages to being of the Nonmind!
target:
TEXT_HEAVNZ219_01788_CIBLEROIT_000_022哀れな「繋がりし者たち」は、兵隊しか肉を食えない。
だが、我らは「繋ぎ止めし者」の意思に縛られず、肉を食う。
なにせ「分かたれし者たち」なのだからな……シシシシシ。
